changeSet.sql: update cdr.concept c join cdr.achilles_results r on r.stratum_1 = c.concept_id and r.analysis_id = 3000 set c.count_value = r.count_value;
update cdr.concept c join cdr.achilles_results r on r.analysis_id = 1 set c.prevalence = round(c.count_value / r.count_value ,2);
